entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
